title: Admin Dashboard Simulator
description: Build a dashboard data generator that simulates what Django admin would display for our finance tracker.
instructions: Create classes that generate realistic admin dashboard data including list views, aggregations, and recent activity.

hints.text: **Hint:** Use `random.choice()` to pick categories and accounts. Use `datetime.now() - timedelta(days=N)` for random dates. Store category type with each transaction to calculate income vs expense totals.

commonMistakes.consequence: Loading thousands of records crashes the browser
commonMistakes.correction: Always set list_per_page and use pagination in admin
